title: [1] Navigation & Layout Analysis Agent
description: Analyze NavigationSplitView implementation, window management, column visibility, and cross-platform navigation patterns. Compare with Apple Sample Code 'BringingRobustNavigationStructureToYourSwiftUIApp' and 'BringingMultipleWindowsToYourSwiftUIApp'. Identify improvements needed for macOS 26 and iOS 26 adaptation. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [10] Animations & Transitions Analysis Agent
description: Analyze view transitions, animations, matched geometry effects, and reduce motion support. Compare with 'PhaseAndKeyframeAnimationSample' and 'FrutaBuildingAFeatureRichAppWithSwiftUI' animation patterns. Evaluate animation consistency across the app. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [11] Data Persistence Analysis Agent
description: Analyze SwiftData models, JobStore, DocumentStore, NoteStore, error recovery, and schema management. Compare with 'Swift and SwiftData/' Apple samples. Evaluate indexing strategy, relationships, and iCloud/CloudKit sync potential. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [12] State Management Analysis Agent
description: Analyze @Observable view models, store patterns, business logic separation, and error handling. Compare with 'FrutaBuildingAFeatureRichAppWithSwiftUI' and 'LandmarksBuildingAnAppWithLiquidGlass' MVVM patterns. Evaluate testing feasibility and async/await patterns. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [13] File Management Analysis Agent
description: Analyze document storage, file operations, external storage usage, and Quick Look integration. Compare with 'AddFunctionalityToFinderWithActionExtensions' patterns. Evaluate iOS file access adaptation and document preview capabilities. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [14] Network & Sync Analysis Agent
description: Analyze networking layer, API integrations, CloudKit/iCloud sync potential, and background operations. Compare with 'App Services/' Apple samples. Evaluate offline support and background refresh strategies. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [15] Testing & Quality Analysis Agent
description: Analyze existing test coverage, unit test patterns, UI test strategies, and code quality tools. Compare with Apple Sample Code test implementations. Evaluate SwiftLint integration and CI/CD pipeline requirements. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [2] Sidebar & Navigation Analysis Agent
description: Analyze sidebar implementation, search tokens, filtering, and sort options. Compare with 'FrutaBuildingAFeatureRichAppWithSwiftUI' sidebar patterns. Evaluate keyboard navigation and iOS adaptation requirements. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [3] Table/Data Display Analysis Agent
description: Analyze job list display implementation, Table vs List usage, row actions, and selection management. Compare with 'FoodTruckBuildingASwiftUIMultiplatformApp' data display patterns. Propose improvements for macOS Table component and iOS List adaptation. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [4] Charts & Visualization Analysis Agent
description: Analyze EnhancedStatsView implementation, chart types, data visualization, and accessibility. Compare with 'Swift-Charts-Examples-main' and 'LandmarksBuildingAnAppWithLiquidGlass' for chart implementations. Evaluate chart accessibility and cross-platform adaptation. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [5] Toolbar & Commands Analysis Agent
description: Analyze toolbar implementation, MenuBarCommands, keyboard shortcuts, and command priorities. Compare with 'FoodTruckBuildingASwiftUIMultiplatformApp' and 'BuildingAGreatMacAppWithSwiftUI' command patterns. Evaluate iOS toolbar/tab bar adaptation. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [6] Settings & Preferences Analysis Agent
description: Analyze SettingsView implementation, SettingsManager, preferences storage, and appearance settings. Compare with 'BuildingAGreatMacAppWithSwiftUI' settings patterns. Evaluate iOS settings presentation adaptation. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [7] Dialogs & Popovers Analysis Agent
description: Analyze sheet implementations, dialogs, alerts, and popovers. Compare with 'FrutaBuildingAFeatureRichAppWithSwiftUI' for presentation patterns. Evaluate iOS sheet adaptations with detents and drag indicators. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [8] Styling & Materials Analysis Agent
description: Analyze Theme.swift, ViewModifiers, materials, and visual styling. Compare with 'LandmarksBuildingAnAppWithLiquidGlass' for Liquid Glass implementation. Evaluate SF Symbol usage consistency and typography hierarchy. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.

title: [9] Accessibility & Localization Analysis Agent
description: Analyze AccessibilityManager, accessibility labels, hints, and VoiceOver support. Compare with 'CreatingAccessibleViews' best practices. Evaluate reduce motion support and localization infrastructure. Append findings to CODEBASE_OPENCODE_ANALYSIS.md.
